ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectOrder No. 150 - (British Columbia) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 150 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the RAINSTORM AND OVERLAND FLOODING that affected the Regional Districts of Skeena-Queen and Kitimat-Stikine from September 5 to 8, 2011.
